body_html: I've installed the 0.2.1 binaries locally, and it seems like the fix we need didn't make it in, despite being in top-of-tree ahead of time! :( I'm following up with the Bazel team to find out what happened, and what we can do to fix this.

body: I've installed the 0.2.1 binaries locally, and it seems like the fix we need didn't make it in, despite being in top-of-tree ahead of time! :( I'm following up with the Bazel team to find out what happened, and what we can do to fix this.
